comment: Dr. Schaab was a great prof! Theres a lot of discussion posts and written work, but it is all very useful and based on insightful readings. Reading and participation are necessary. She is very friendly and genuinely wants you to succeed!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: I don't understand these ratings. I've had her for two semesters and she's great, she's incredibly generous, and you can literally only fail her class if you don't read or if your writing is garbage. I put in 0 effort to this class and got a 100 twice. A literal 100. The other two people leaving ratings have to be drastially stupid.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: I took this class online. We read a couple chapters of Nick Sousanis , not the easiest to read, but other than that do the work because it is really easy. She grades very fair, easy to talk to. Hope this helps someone.
Very very tough grader. I would not take her again.
Very inconsistent grader. Talks very loud. Buy earplugs. Make sure you do her discussions... I don't know how to describe her without totally thrashing her integrity apart
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
